snippet: The United Food and Commercial Workers pledged not to try to unionize Walmart workers to avert charges that it engaged in illegal picketing.
abstract: United Food and Commercial Workers, nation's largest union of retail and grocery workers, formally pledges not to try to unionize Walmart workers; pledge is meant to avert likely charges from regulators that union engaged in weeks of illegal picketing at Walmart stores in 2012.
lead_paragraph: The United Food and Commercial Workers pledged not to try to unionize Walmart workers to avert charges that it engaged in illegal picketing.

headline.seo: Labor Union Agrees to Stop Picketing at Walmart
headline.main: Labor Union to Ease Walmart Picketing
headline.print_headline: Labor Union To Ease Walmart Picketing

keywords.value: United Food and Commercial Workers Union
keywords.name: organizations

keywords.value: Organization United for Respect at Walmart
